title: just a question about vaynes attack range. not a nerf suggestion
body: why is vayne a marksmen assassin? if she excels in 1v1 setups why isnt her range at 1v1 dueling level which is 450? in my opinion thats 1v1 range. its a question not a nerf suggestion. 550 is pretty far away to be a 1v1 styled champ.

Well, the thing is - Vayne isn't a toplaner, and top has pretty much always been her shittiest role she can even come close to playing.

It's a lot of range compared to melee champions, yes, but that's the only thing she has going for her top. Almost any toplaner can wipe the floor with her, and she's dead if she gets ganked.

To compare - even when she was at 54% winrate her top winrate was something like 48%. Even when she was busted to hell and back she was *still* useless in top.
vayne was busted? how so? was it kassadin level?

I don't remember when it was tbh. Some time later s7 I think. I want to say shortly before Ardent meta, but that's probably wrong.

No, it was not permaban Kass level (although boards acted like it was). She was like 54% winrate 20% pickrate or something.

And her toplane winrate was still fucking abysmal lmao.

honestly i feel vayne is a waste of ban i dont know why people ban her. her whole kit is entirely selfish. i would rather ban a yasuo or a yi due to the actual threat/anxiety they produce later in the game where if they purchase X items you auto lose. at least she has to wait till her whole item box is full to be godly.
Because "assassin" is a shit word to describe her, and 450 range would require massive durability buffs for her to actually be remotely playable.

Way more than just that.

Vayne is already one of the squishiest champions in the game. Shit tier resistances, shit tier health, no abilities that give durability, not really able to go into resolve...

Vayne is balanced around the fact that almost literally any champion in the game can one-shot her, regardless of their build. Reducing her range would completely fuck her over in teamfights, since she'd just have too little range and too little durability, so she'd have to have a durability increase, but then Riot would have to re-balance QE and R around being more durable and lower range...

It'd require a balancing effort on the scale of a smaller rework to do and not make Vayne useless or OP.
so do you think its doable having a adc having 450 attack range while maintaining her identity as a marksman duelist that can 1v1 well? we nah her identity would have to be erased if that happened.

The problem is that Vayne doesn't have any way to interact with targets outside of her autoattack range, unlike other ADCs. Sivir, for example, can ult for her team with no enemies nearby as well as poke with Q and W, but all of Vayne's usefulness is packed into her autoattack range.
